name: ZTER is back!
description:
ZTER is back! is a platform game in which you get used to the dark world Merid in which you play as a character ZTER. The whole world Merida is special because it is dark and dangerous but especially in this world there is a specific gravity. Gravity behaves according to your movements and time by which gravity is so strong that time passes 10 times faster than in the normal world. You never know how gravity and maintain what you do. Gravity is so strong that generates Pony, it is a small accelerators that speed of gravity and time.

Comming soon new level pack ZYX 2!

Hardware:
Minimal:
CPU: Intel/AMD 2 jádra 2,2Ghz
GPU: Ati/AMD/Nvidia 512MB - Intel HD Graphic 2000+
RAM: 1GB
HDD: 100MB

Recommended:
CPU: Intel core i3 Ivy-Bridge 3,2Ghz
GPU: Nvidia GTX 660 2GB
RAM: 2GB
Volné místo na disku: 100MB

Platforms:
Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/8 RT/10

Comming soon to Android!
